#summary Built-in Join Service

= The Join Service =

|| http://frizione.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/Images/join.png || From the project home page you can select the !JavaScript files to join... ||

The Join files contain a simple syntax to define the files to be joined, and where they are to be saved:
{{{
  /*join to: /js/browser-unittester.cjs
       gzip: /js/browser-unittester.cjs.gz */
  <%= include('./json2.js', './xhr.js', '../dev/unit-test.js', './saver.js') %>
}}}

|| The Join results page displays the join information. || http://frizione.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/docs/Images/join-result.png ||
